author: Staff Reporter
text:
Action has been initiated against owners of 11 petrol/diesel retail outlets in the district for failing to comply with rules under the Legal Metrology Act, 2009.

According to a release, a team of officials, including the Legal Metrology Department’s Deputy Controller, Vellore, conducted checks at 102 outlets in December last. They found sale of less quantity of fuel at 11 petrol/diesel retail outlets.

Following this, action was initiated against owners of these outlets under the Legal Metrology Act 2009.
title: Action initated against petrol retail outlets
